installCommand: rm -rf ~/.npm ~/.npmrc /root/.npm /root/.npmrc /vercel/.npmrc 2>/dev/null || true && npm config delete _auth 2>/dev/null || true && npm config delete _authToken 2>/dev/null || true && npm config delete always-auth 2>/dev/null || true && npm config set registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ && npm config set //registry.npmjs.org/:_authToken '' 2>/dev/null || true && npm install --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/
